sentences.sContent: When it comes to love, we're ambivalent about "opposites attract".
sentences.sContent_eng: When it comes to love, we're ambivalent about "opposites attract".
sentences.sCn: 说到“爱情”，我们对“异性相吸”怀有矛盾的看法。

sentences.sContent: On his way out the rabbi told me my mother was ambivalent about dying, after all those years of nagging us all to help her on her way.
sentences.sContent_eng: On his way out the rabbi told me my mother was ambivalent about dying, after all those years of nagging us all to help her on her way.
sentences.sCn: 在出来时，牧师告诉我说，虽然这些年来母亲一直唠叨让我们帮助她归西，但是对于死亡，她的内心还是矛盾。

remMethod.val: ambi(双方的) + val(力量) + ent → 双方都有力量的 → 对立的， 感情矛盾的

words.tran: [心理] 矛盾情绪；正反感情并存

trans.tranCn: 对立的， 感情矛盾的
trans.tranOther: not sure whether you want or like something or not
